text: Bafashe abamenyi babo n’abihayimana muri bo ndetse na Masihi (Mesiya) mwene Mariyamu, babagira ibigirwamana babasimbuza Allah, nyamara bari barategetswe kutagira ikindi basenga kitari Imana imwe rukumbi. Nta wundi ukwiye kugaragirwa by’ukuri uretse Yo. Ubutagatifu ni ubwayo, kandi ntaho ihuriye n’ibyo bayibangikanya nabyo
